pages.text: A mysterious fragment that binds to your soul. Once picked up, it cannot be dropped or removed; it becomes a permanent part of you, continuously healing your wounds.

pages.title: Passive Healing
pages.text: $(bold)Base Effect:$()$(br)Heals 1 health every 200 ticks (10 seconds).$(br2)$(bold)Stacking:$()$(br)Each additional fragment reduces the healing interval by 5 ticks (0.25 seconds).$(br2)$(bold)Minimum:$() Healing cannot occur faster than once per second (20 ticks), even with many fragments.

pages.title: WARNING
pages.text: $(bold)$(4)PERMANENT BINDING$(bold)$()$(br2)Once a Fragment of Healing enters your inventory, it $(bold)cannot$():$(li)Be dropped$(li)Be stored in chests$(li)Be placed in shulker boxes$(li)Be removed (except on death)$(br2)$(italic)Choose wisely before picking up.$()
